synonyms.synonym: SAM, WWE and DDHD domain-containing protein 1

protein.specific_function: Phospholipase that hydrolyzes preferentially phosphatidic acid and phosphatidylethanolamine. May be involved in the maintenance of the endoplasmic reticulum and/or Golgi structures

reference.reference_text: Nakajima K, Sonoda H, Mizoguchi T, Aoki J, Arai H, Nagahama M, Tagaya M, Tani K: A novel phospholipase A1 with sequence homology to a mammalian Sec23p-interacting protein, p125. J Biol Chem. 2002 Mar 29;277(13):11329-35. Epub 2002 Jan 11.
